^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LDAP.longDescription: This property shall contain the first LDAP external account provider that this account service supports.  If the account service supports one or more LDAP services as an external account provider, this entity shall be populated by default.  This entity shall not be present in the additional external account providers resource collection.
LDAP.description: The first LDAP external account provider that this account service supports.

ExternalAccountProvider.description: The external account provider services that can provide accounts for this manager to use for authentication.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ExternalAccountProvider.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that represent external account provider services that can provide accounts for this manager to use for authentication.

StartTLSEnabled.description: An indication of whether StartTLS is enabled
StartTLSEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether StartTLS is enabled.
